english.segment1: Majesty of heaven. You're glory fills the skies. Light of the world. You are lord of all
english.segment2: Humbled by your presence. Amazed by who you are. Nothing compares. You are lord of all
english.segment3: Chorus. To you the nations bow down. To you a creation cries out. Majesty. All things you hold together. Your name will stand forever. Majesty. You are majesty
english.segment4: Verse 2. Merciful and mighty. My heart is overwhelmed. You stand alone. You are lord of all
english.segment5: Bridge. Your name above all others. High and exalted. Your kingdom shall reign forever. High and exalted.
